summary: Successfully deployed critical OAuth authentication fixes to production. Completed deep project analysis, diagnosed OAuth variable mismatches, applied fixes to auth.ts, and pushed to GitHub triggering Vercel auto-deployment. Build confirmed OAuth configuration now valid (allValid: true). Enhanced weather API error handling with new error boundaries.
